question: Can I relate a hardship Allah has incurred on me to others with the sole intention of requesting their Duâ€™aa? If I do this, am I being Be-Sabr (impatient) and incur the wrath of Allah s.w.t.?
answer:
QUESTION
ANSWER


Share:
This should not be done in the form of a complaint. You will not be counted as an impatient person. In fact, we should all express our helplessness, and beg of the mercy of Allah.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Ml. Imraan Vawda
FATWA DEPT.
